extendedInfo.description: Hit game Hangman Deluxe Premium finally available on android phones! - More than 4 million downloads on Android, iPhone and Windows Phones already - EXCLUSIVE Premium themes included : JACK AND THE BEANSTALK and THE WONDERFUL WIZARD OF OZ !!!A fun spin on a classical game, this hangman game will bring you more than any other available hangman app:- Learn new words in 3 languages! English, Spanish, French... What a challenge!- Over 10,000 hand-picked words (regular updates)- 6 beautifully designed themes with their associated characters and word lists (classic, cowboy, pirate, businessman and monster). Please save them from the rope and the gallows!- 2 extra themes: Halloween & Christmas- 8 difficulty levels (and more to come)- 5 different lifelines to help you guess words placed by some evil executioner- Beware though, because the task wonât be easy: Words to decipher have been carefully chosen- 2 languages, English (american & british mix) and French,- Upper levels can be unlocked by achieving specific scores. The extra Halloween & Christmas themes can be accessed separately.Stay abreast of your app latest developments, give your feedback and like it on:Â https://www.facebook.com/HangmanDeluxePremiumÂ Hangman Deluxe Premium is brought to you by: - Ahead Solutions, a software company that develops many apps, games and mobile services on different mobile platforms - Smart&Soft, a company specialized in Android, iPhone & iPad application development. Any issue? Please contact us at : support@ahead-solutions.com, with your specific issue. Discover our apps & services: http://www.ahead-solutions.com -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-Note : The hang-man game (also called jeu de pendu, el ahorcado, galgenmÃ¤nnchen, henker, l'impiccato, Jogo da Forca) is a classic word game, as well as a strategy game based on letter selection in order to guess and spell, discover or decipher words by finding all the letters constituting a specific word. It is close to other board games like puzzles, scrabble, crossword puzzle, quizzes or trivia. This type of game will be enjoyed by the whole family, adults (for fun), as well as kids, children (for education purposes). It may help you learn new words, increase your vocabulary (in spanish with ahorcado), thanks to its definitions taken from an official dictionary by guessing riddles from different categories. Definition of the word to guess, hints, clues, lifelines and good strategies will facilitate your progression throughout this challenge and avoid the rope and gallows ! In brief, itâs an educational, intelligent game for people fond of strategies, brain challenges while being still entertaining, interesting, fun with a beautiful design (check Halloween level) and a nice game play. We hope youâll enjoy playing this hang man. On top of that, this app is free, isnât that great !? Be smart, play Hangman Deluxe Premium !

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Very addictive play it all the time. I recommend you download it and give it a try
reviews.author: Kathy Durston

reviews.comment: Very educational and challenging game, love the hints because I can research info on the internet
reviews.author: DA FLYNN

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Ce jeu est excellent. Je ne m\' en lasse jamais.
reviews.author: James Pierre

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: I downloaded this game 2 weeks ago so I could get rewards for use in another game, and enjoyed it so much that I am still playing.
reviews.author: Stephen Ryan

reviews.title: I enjoy it quite a bit
reviews.comment: I wish the lower levels were a bit easier. I cannot find a setting for easy mid high insane. That\'s all I am missing to gey the hang of it. Yy to the trsm for all os their efforts, for a disabled person this helps.
reviews.author: Shellie Campbell

reviews.title: 4 Stars!
reviews.comment: Very nice game and,  recommend to almost everybody!
reviews.author: Carole Bradbury

reviews.title: Fucken Sucks!!!
reviews.comment: This Isn\'t Even The Way U Play HangMan... Wares The Hints, Or Picture Ect... Bullshit... Should Be Called \"Guess The Word\" Not HangMan... Zero Stars On My Behalf...
reviews.author: Raider Flores

reviews.title: I give it 4.
reviews.comment: Can you Give some more exciting features in this game?
reviews.author: Catherine Andaquig

reviews.comment: Love playing your app. You come up with words i havent heard of. Well done. Only question is, where do i look for the initial clue.\tThis is addictive, great way to upskill your vocabulary.
reviews.author: Sharlene Bell

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I play alot  of tjis game it is a great way to pass time!!
reviews.author: Jordan Probst

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: But, there should be an easier way to get tokens, other than using real money. Not every one has money to throw away, on a silly game!!!
reviews.author: mikki Wells

reviews.title: Too random for good gameplay
reviews.comment: Words are too random without clues, that is unless u want to spend $$$. Its like opening a dictionary and selecting one .. I.e Afghan... Without a buying a hint is v difficult in hangman. Followed by forgo. Nice graphics..lots of potential, shame its wasted!
reviews.author: Dee Deezer

reviews.title: Couple things.
reviews.comment: THAT IS NOT HOW ONE PLAYS HANGMAN. IT IS NOT GUESS RANDOM LETTERS UNTIL YOUR BUDDY DIES. IT IS SOLVE THE RIDDLE OR GUESS A WORD UNDER A CATEGORY. ERGO. HINTS SHOULD BE FREE. It is also massively stupid to force us to lose all points from failing once.
reviews.author: Brittany Quick

reviews.title: Frustrated
reviews.comment: I really like this game. It would be better if the D, I, M and R were selected the first time I touch them. Having to sit there for ages tapping them to select them is a PAIN!!
reviews.author: Jodi Maree

reviews.title: Hangman
reviews.comment: Works fine but uninstalling because it doesn\'t have English spelling. Only American
reviews.author: Kieran Wild McCallum

reviews.title: Addicted to new Hangman
reviews.comment: I love all word games, but Hangman has always been my favorite.   I have seen words that were not in mu vocabulary before I started playing this new game, and since I get the definitions,  this is brain exercise.   It\'s a brilliant set-up, with currency called Ludos that enable players to \"buy\" various hints.  This way you don\'t have to go back to the first level if you miss a word occasionally.   I love it!
reviews.author: Rachel Freeny
